description:
Tachibana Hinata and Jinguuji Tsukasa have been best friends since childhood. Now, at 32 years old, they`re both average businessmen. One night after a mixer, an entity calling itself a goddess sends them to another world. When Jinguuji opens his eyes, he sees Tachibana, who`s been transformed into a beautiful, blue-eyed, blonde girl. Now that the two are of different genders from each other, they`re each bewildered by the other`s charms. They steel their determination to defeat the Demon Lord in order to return to who they were with their relationship still intact.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Guy Who Reincarnated as a Fantasy Knockout and Another Guy
Fa Bi Niku Ojisan to Ojisan
ファ美肉おじさんとおじさん
